question: Recently, the Government of Karnataka amended the Karnataka Poisons (Possession and Sale) Rules 2015 in August 2019. Which of the following is the new classification of "nicotine" poison?
explanation: Government of Karnataka amended the Karnataka Poisons (Possession and Sale) Rules 2015. It notified Nicotine as “Class A poison”.The main aim is to strengthen the enforcement of the ban on production and sale of electronic cigarettes. The new rules are called the Karnataka Poisons (Possession and Sale) Rules, 2019.
